statement.p: In 18.75 of the last 48 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{48}}={0.1875}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{48}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1875}\cdot{48}={9}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 48-9=39 We round that as requested to 39.
